    • Field Detail

      • urlFailureCacheConfiguration

        private CacheConfiguration urlFailureCacheConfiguration
        the url failure cache configuration.

      • fileLockConfiguration

        private FileLockConfiguration fileLockConfiguration
        the FileLocking configuration.

      • dataDirectory

        private String dataDirectory
        The base directory where the archiva data is stored. If not set, the appserver.base is used.

      • repositoryBaseDirectory

        private String repositoryBaseDirectory
        The base directory for local storage of repository data. If not set, it's ${dataDirectory}/repositories.

      • remoteRepositoryBaseDirectory

        private String remoteRepositoryBaseDirectory
        The base directory for local storage of remote repository data. If not set, it's ${dataDirectory}/remotes.

      • defaultLanguage

        private String defaultLanguage
        The default language used for setting internationalized strings.

      • languageRange

        private String languageRange
        Comma separated list of language patterns. Sorted by priority descending. Used for display of internationalized strings.
